actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to establish a 90-day period during which Vietnam era veterans currently barred from applying for service disabled veterans' insurance by reason of lapse of time may apply for such insurance.

summary.text: Establishes a ninety-day period during which Vietnam era veterans currently barred from appling for service disabled veterans' insurance by reason of lapse of time may apply for such insurance.

titles.title: A bill to establish a 90-day period during which Vietnam era veterans currently barred from applying for service disabled veterans' insurance by reason of lapse of time may apply for such insurance.
